attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Freeview with its limited capacity has as many as five shopping and infomercial channels at certain times of the day. This amounts to more that 10% of total capacity. With another 5 channels that are not free and the chance of BskyB charging for its three channels these create a detrimental effect on the freeview brand

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
